NanoLoanEngine.cosign (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#610-621) uses timestamp for comparisons

	Dangerous comparisons:

NanoLoanEngine.lend (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#564-601) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= loan.expirationRequest) (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#569-570)
	- require(bool)(loan.cosigner == address(cosigner)) (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#591)
	- loan.cancelableAt > 0 (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#572-574)
	- require(bool)(rcn.transferFrom(msg.sender,loan.borrower,safeMult(loan.amount,rate))) (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#593-596)
	- require(bool)(loan.status == Status.initial) (/unique_chucks/42/0xba5a172874698491f0e83a447c55735eccd854e3.sol#569)
